title: What are the altered states of consciousness? - Quora

response.answer_text: Well, I'd think there is a significantly altered state for most drugs legal and illigal. Sensory input like music, video, and others would count too. Biology and environment would also cause altered states so there'd be at least one different state for all 7+ billion of us. If any one person is different by default and they can experience one or more altered states on top of their default, then you have a mind boggling number of possibilities.

You are familiar with dreaming already; that is one such altered state. You probably felt drunk at least once, or woozy from the dentist’s gassing you; that is another. Others include from meditation or hallucinations. You can also feel “flow” when you are fully engrossed in some activity. There are many types.
